testcase.name: SOAP API Testing with external file
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request read('soapAPIPayloadInput.xml') ............................... passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains "98.6" ........................................ passed And match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == "98.6" .................. passed And match responseHeaders['Server'] == ['Microsoft-IIS/7.5'] .............. passed And match responseHeaders['Server'][0] == 'Microsoft-IIS/7.5' ............. passed And match responseType == 'xml' ........................................... passed And assert responseTime <= '1000' ......................................... passed
